actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual to exclude from gross income the gain from the sale or exchange of the individual's principal residence.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the gain from the sale or exchange of a taxpayer's principal residence provided that he has used and owned it as such for five out of the previous eight years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual to exclude from gross income the gain from the sale or exchange of the individual's principal residence.
